i1.name: Arcane Mastery
i1.descriptionHtml: Innate: Ryze gains (Unknown value: #var:am% per 100 AP) bonus mana.
i1.notes:
* ''The following information is outdated since [[V10.23]]:''
* ''Arcane Mastery'' stacks [[Recursion|recursively]] with {{ii|Seraph's Embrace}} and multiplicatively with other sources of {{as|% ability power}}. Examples on how they calculate below:
** Case 1: With {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcap}}, a total of ({{as|{{#var:rd}}% AP}}) {{as|'''bonus''' ability power}} and ({{as|({{#expr:{{#var:am}}*(1+{{#var:rd}}/100)}}% AP)}}{{as|% mana}}) {{as|'''bonus''' mana}} is gained.
** Case 2: With {{ii|Seraph's Embrace}} a total of (({{#var:se}} + {{as|{{#expr:{{#var:se}}*{{#var:am}}/100}}% AP}}){{as|% mana}}){{divided by}}(1 - {{as|{{#expr:{{#var:se}}*{{#var:am}}/10000}}% mana}}) {{as|'''bonus''' ability power}} and (({{as|{{#expr:{{#var:se}}*{{#var:am}}/100}}% mana}} + {{as|{{#var:am}}% AP}}){{as|% mana}}){{divided by}}(1 - {{as|{{#expr:{{#var:se}}*{{#var:am}}/10000}}% mana}}) {{as|'''bonus''' mana}} is gained.
** Case 3: With {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcap}} + {{ii|Seraph's Embrace}} a total of (({{#expr:{{#var:se}}*(1+{{#var:rd}}/100)}} + {{as|{{#expr:{{#var:se}}*{{#var:am}}/100*(1+{{#var:rd}}/100)}}% AP}}){{as|% mana}}){{divided by}}(1 - {{as|{{#expr:{{#var:se}}*{{#var:am}}/10000*(1+{{#var:rd}}/100)}}% mana}}) {{as|'''bonus''' ability power}} and (({{as|{{#expr:{{#var:se}}*{{#var:am}}/100*(1+{{#var:rd}}/100)}}% mana}} + {{as|{{#expr:{{#var:am}}*(1+{{#var:rd}}/100)}}% AP}}){{as|% mana}}){{divided by}}(1 - {{as|{{#expr:{{#var:se}}*{{#var:am}}/10000*(1+{{#var:rd}}/100)}}% mana}}) {{as|'''bonus''' mana}} is gained.

w1.name: Rune Prison
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ryze''' imprisons the target enemy, dealing them {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 35% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
{{sbc|{{ai|Spell Flux|Ryze|Flux:}}}} ''Rune Prison's'' {{tip|slow}} is converted to a {{tip|root}} for the same duration.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ryze imprisons the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds.
Flux: Rune Prison's slow is converted to a root for the same duration.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 60% AP) (+ 4% bonus mana)

e1.name: Spell Flux
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ryze''' hurls an orb of runic energy at the target enemy, dealing them {{as|magic damage}}.
''Spell Flux'' marks the primary target and all enemies near them with ''Flux'' for 3 seconds. '''Ryze's''' basic abilities against enemies with ''Flux'' consume the mark to become empowered.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ryze hurls an orb of runic energy at the target enemy, dealing them magic damage.
Spell Flux marks the primary target and all enemies near them with Flux for 3 seconds. Ryze's basic abilities against enemies with Flux consume the mark to become empowered.
Flux: Spell Flux spreads further.
e1.notes:
* ''Spell Flux's'' second cast on a target will apply a new ''Flux'' debuff as well as triggering the previous one (effectively refreshing the duration).
* {{pending for test}} bounce range {{tip|er|icononly = true}} to-edge or {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} to-center?
** Game data notes additional range checks of 400 (bounce range) and 500 (Q damage bounce range) against 'large' enemies.
* ''Spell Flux'' can be buffered {{fd|0.5}} seconds before it comes off cooldown.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 30% AP) (+ 2% bonus mana)

r1.name: Realm Warp
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Increases {{ais|Overload|Ryze}} damage against targets marked with {{ai|Spell Flux|Ryze}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Ryze''' opens a portal on the ground at his current location and {{tip|channel|channels}} for 2 seconds, then all allied units within the portal {{tip|blink}} to the target location upon completion and become {{tip|root|rooted}}, {{tip|disarm|disarmed}}, {{tip|silence|silenced}} and {{tip|untargetable}} for {{tt|{{fd|0.75}}|Approximated}} seconds.
''Realm Warp'' casts at maximum range if cast beyond that.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Increases Overload's damage against targets marked with Spell Flux.
Active: Ryze opens a portal on the ground at his current location and channels for 2 seconds, then all allied units within the portal blink to the target location upon completion and become rooted, disarmed, silenced and untargetable for 0.75 seconds.
Realm Warp casts at maximum range if cast beyond that.
r1.notes:
* ''Realm Warp'' will try to predict whether an ally is trying to run out of it or not and will not teleport allies that are very near the edge and move click outside of it.
* Blinked units retain the same relative positions to one another upon arrival.
* ''Realm Warp'' will affect {{tip|untargetable}} units.
* '''Ryze''' will not teleport if he exits the area, but the teleport will still occur for other allies so long as he isn't {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}.
* Allies will teleport regardless of being affected by {{tip|crowd control}} or not.
* Allied {{tip|stasis (buff)|stasis}} effects will '''not''' interrupt ''Realm Warp's'' channel - excluding {{ii|Zhonya's Hourglass}} and {{ii|Stopwatch}} - like the passive of {{ii|Guardian Angel}} or an allied {{cai|Tempered Fate|Bard}}.
** A hostile {{cai|Tempered Fate|Bard}} will interrupt the channel.
** ''Realm Warp'' will not cancel if '''Ryze''' enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
* ''Realm Warp'' will not silence allies ''while'' they are {{tip|channel|channeling}}, in order to not interrupt them.
** Allies whose channel is interruptable can thus cast other spells during the period, provided they are not movement spells (since they remain rooted).
* Whether ''Realm Warp's'' teleports champions {{tip|channel|channeling}} certain abilities is handled mostly case-by-case:
** The following will prevent the caster from being teleported: {{si|Teleport}}, {{si|Recall}}, {{ai|Ace in the Hole|Caitlyn}}, {{ai|Curtain Call|Jhin}}, {{ai|Umbral Trespass|Kayn}}{{tt|*|Kayn is prevented from being teleported during the dash into and attached sections}},  and {{ai|Rite of the Arcane|Xerath}}.
** The following do not prevent the caster from being teleported and are '''not''' interrupted: {{ai|Absolute Zero|Nunu}}, {{ai|Aegis Assault|Pantheon}}, {{ai|Bullet Time|Miss Fortune}}{{tt|*|The cast pivots of the separate lines remain the same, thus thinning or spreading the area after the teleport.}}, {{ai|Comet Spear|Pantheon}}, {{ai|Crowstorm|Fiddlesticks}}{{tt|*|When Fiddlesticks' channel resolves, he will blink the full distance to his own target location regardless of how far away Ryze has taken him.}}, {{ai|Decimating Smash|Sion}}, {{ai|Grand Starfall|Pantheon}}, {{ai|Requiem|Karthus}}, {{ai|Stormbringer|Volibear}}, {{ai|Unstoppable Onslaught|Sion}}, {{ai|Vault Breaker|Vi}}, {{si|Hexflash}}, and {{uis|Rift Herald}} windup/leap.
** The following do not prevent the caster from being teleported but '''are''' interrupted: {{ai|Biggest Snowball Ever!|Nunu}}
** ''These lists are not complete.''
* ''Realm Warp'' will also not teleport {{tip|displacement immune}} allies.
* ''Realm Warp'' will still teleport allies in a {{tip|zombie state}}.
* ''Realm Warp'' will not teleport allies affected by another ally's ''Realm Warp'' first.
* If no {{tip|champion|champions}} but one or more {{tip|minion|minions}} are teleported, ''Realm Warp'' will not teleport the minion closest to its center, and furthermore {{tt|shuffles the positions of the other teleported minions|Minions are teleported to the position the next-inner minion was intended to go to, and the intended position of the last minion is never being teleported to}}.{{bug}}
** If a champion is present, the innermost minion is teleported on top the outermost champion's new position, and the remaining minions are teleported to their proper intended positions.{{bug}}
